newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.62 pct vs mark/USD basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.62 pct vs mark/USD basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown on Thursday at 27.138 to the dollar after Wednesday's fixing at 27.026, and at 17.713 to the mark from 17.730.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +2.62 percent, after a deviation of +2.70 on Wednesday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +2.62 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
